amendment.description: To provide for the Herbert Hoover Dike Supplemental Major Rehabilitation Report.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4888 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4888 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Jeffords. (consideration: CR S8977; text: CR S8977) To provide for the Herbert Hoover Dike Supplemental Major Rehabilitation Report.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4888 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Jeffords.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4888 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
